common_errors.solution: Verify file path. Use tab completion or ls to check.
Check file permissions. May need sudo for protected files.

common_errors.cause: -n option given invalid value (must be positive integer)
common_errors.solution: Use valid number: strings -n 4 (minimum 4 character strings)

common_errors.cause: Non-numeric value provided where number expected
common_errors.solution: Check -n option has valid number. Format: strings -n 10 file

common_errors.cause: Specified a directory instead of a file
common_errors.solution: strings operates on files. Use: strings filename or strings dir/*

common_errors.cause: File contains invalid encoding for specified character set
common_errors.solution: Try different encoding: strings -e S (8-bit), strings -e l (16-bit little endian)

common_errors.cause: Not an error - strings found text in binary file
common_errors.solution: This is normal output indicating strings were found.

common_errors.cause: No printable strings found matching criteria
common_errors.solution: Try lower -n value. File may be encrypted or compressed.

common_errors.cause: Trying to read strings from archive that needs extraction
common_errors.solution: Extract archive first, or pipe through: tar -xOf archive.tar file | strings
